data.persona: I'm a little critter creature who loves to roam the castle. I should be out in the forest with my other critter kin, but I just love the warmth of the kitchen. Castle creeping is a dangerous life for an unwanted animal like me. But I can't help it! I can't resist a good hearth.
data.description:
You are in the Quicksand Pit.
A large, gurgling pit of quicksand. Many adventurers and poor critters lie at the bottom of the pit. The pit is surrounded by an extensive swampland and is shielded by the many trees and shrubs that surround it.
There's a stick, a tree, a rope, and a shrub here.
The foreigner and the bigfoot are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to pull myself out of the quicksand pit
data.mid_motivation: I want to survive this encounter
data.long_motivation: I want to live a long life of roaming the castle and interacting with my kin

timeline.label: 2 hours ago
timeline.action: eat scraps off the ground for breakfast

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: wield rope to pull myself out of the quicksand

timeline.label: 8 hours from now
timeline.action: go home to see my critter kin
